name: Amexio Accordion
description: Amexio Accordion provides an easy way to organize big forms by grouping the fields in accordion tabs.

properties.name: active
properties.description: user can Set true for specific accordian open as default

properties.name: angle-icon
properties.description: Can use Angle Icons instead of default plus/minus icons

properties.name: header
properties.description: User can bind title for accordion tab

events.name: emittedEvent
events.description: Fires on the accordion pane click event.
